publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3690 Angela Constance: St John’s Hospital Midwives Secure Top Award from the Royal College of Midwives—That the Parliament congratulates Sandra Smith and Michelle Davidson, midwives from St John’s Hospital, Livingston, on receiving a top midwifery award from the Royal College of Midwives for promoting normal and natural child births; values and applauds the educational services that they provide to help women throughout West Lothian to prepare for birth, and wishes them continued success with their efforts. Supported by: Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Stuart McMillan*, Nanette Milne*, Sandra White*, Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, Robin Harper*

S3M-3690 Angela Constance: St John’s Hospital Midwives Secure Top Award from the Royal College of Midwives—That the Parliament congratulates Sandra Smith and Michelle Davidson, midwives from St John’s Hospital, Livingston, on receiving a top midwifery award from the Royal College of Midwives for promoting normal and natural child births; values and applauds the educational services that they provide to help women throughout West Lothian to prepare for birth, and wishes them continued success with their efforts. Supported by: Shirley-Anne Somerville, Stuart McMillan, Nanette Milne, Sandra White, Bob Doris, Bill Kidd, Robin Harper, Gil Paterson*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3690 St John’s Hospital Midwives Secure Top Award from the Royal College of Midwives (lodged on 12 March 2009) Christine Grahame*
